long_description: Designed to fit most smartphones and the iPod Touch, the Yurbuds Armband is the perfect companion for Yurbuds sport earphones (sold separately). Ultrasoft neoprene material wicks away sweat and moisture while providing a secure and comfortable fit for most arm sizes. Armband helps protect your phone from the elements, but still allows you to access controls through the touch-screen cover. Reflective covering on the Yurbuds Armband provides an extra element of nighttime visibility.
short_description: Designed to fit most smartphones and the iPod Touch, the Yurbuds Armband is the perfect companion for Yurbuds sport earphones (sold separately).
